resources.string: WHICH is a general knowledge quiz. There are three categories available for the moment: Literature, Cinema and Science. There are five questions in each category. There is a hint and a lifeline 1/2 for eliminating two of the options. However you can use each of them only once. You have 60 seconds for each question. A wrong answer or the expiration of time ends the quiz. You receive 20 points for each right answer.
You\'d prefer other categories? Give us feedback!
Thanks for taking your time to send us feedback. WHICH is a new application and we really appreciate your feedback. Chose the categories you would like us to add in WHICH and click send.
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Time expired. Game is over. You scored %1$d /100.
You didn\'t chose any of the options.
Congratulations %1$s! You successfully completed the quiz. You scored 100/100. If you would like compete in another category click new game.
The answer was wrong. Game is over. You scored %1$d /100.
The categories you would like to see in WHICH are:
Welcome to WHICH! Chose a category from below and click start. Don\'t forget to enter your name! Check the menu for rules.
